评论详情: The buttons are just cuts in the fabric. I've worn this twice and the holes stretched to the point where it won't stay buttoned. A bit of sewing around the holes would have been a game changer, but unfortunately it's pretty much useless, now.. Note: I didn't do anything but ride around and walked around some shops and this happened.
Love this! So comfortable and a great value for the style. We friend's love it as well, so that's a plus!

Buttons but no button holes, collar not hemmed, size chart is wildly wrong. This is frankly a scam product and I won't be buying from this seller ever again. Return requires you print a label and send USPS. All around a pain.
This does not “wear” as cleanly as pictured. It sags and bunches up in places

评论概述: Neck part does not look completely hemmed, can see the scissor cut.
评论详情: Beyond the neck area, which I believe for the product I received was not complete (yours might be), this is actually an interesting idea for a shirt. There is a sort of saree-type of drapery that works.  For the product received, the neck area was not hemmed as the image shows, in a way I am not certain is intentional or not. I am leaning toward not intentional since I can see the scissor cut along the fabric.

评论概述: Halloween costume material! Ugly, flimsy and you won’t like it.
评论详情: Don’t waste your time! Don’t waste your money! All you need is a Ghostface mask from the Scream movies and you are ready to go trick-or-treating!

The product is not finished. The collar is unfinished with no hem just cut. Major flaws throughout the item. It is unfortunate as it is cute and material was soft but quality is poor for a finished product.
The material is cheap and looks nothing like pictures they look high quality this is not
